profileAlternative.name: Ben Fhala
profileAlternative.headline: Director Of Engineering at Discovery Inc
profileAlternative.summary:
Ben discovered his passion for data visualization in the start of this century while he was working at Parsons in New York, in their data visualization department, PIIM. He is a published author and has published a book and 10’s of video courses (some of them can be found at 02skills.com ) and has been acknowledged by Adobe to join their advisory board and ACP list. He enjoys spending most of his time learning and teaching and has a love for abstraction, visual programming and visualization in general. Ben has had the honor of developing applications for members of the US Congress, Prime Ministers, and Presidents around the world. He has built many interactive experiences for companies such as Target, AT&T, Crayola, Marriott, Neutrogena, and Nokia. He has technically directed many award-winning projects and has been part of teams that have won three Agency of the Year awards.

Currently Ben is The Technology Director for the UI/UX teams at Discovery.

positions.title: Director Of Engineering
positions.description: Leading multiple teams that are building mobile and CTV applications for Discovery networks. Managing a team of ~16 developers on site (plus ~20 offshore). Main technologies used: React Native, React, TypeScript, goLang, and JEST.

positions.title: Technology Director
positions.description: My own grass roots company. Main focus is online education solutions.

positions.title: UI Tech Lead
positions.description: Manage a team of developers. User interface specialist and lead engineer. Hands on developer and UI team manager of clearme.com. The main technologies we interact with are Gatsby, React, Redux, Node/Express, Jest, Sonar, Bamboo and Dockers.

positions.title: Senior Technical Team Lead (Contract)
positions.description: Helping lead the client side team as the core architect and team lead for one of the most exclusive financial institutions.

positions.title: Interactive Tech Lead (Contract)
positions.description: Helped lead interactive development of award winning websites and applications.

positions.title: Interactive Tech Lead (Contract)
positions.description: Fun things and really great people. Worked on Stride,Sudafed, Royal Caribbean and more.

positions.title: Technology Director (Contract)
positions.description: Lead the solutions and implementation of all technical aspects of projects under my fold. Incredibly proud of the work we created . Leading efforts for Target, AT&T, Conservation International to name a few.

positions.title: Sr. Interactive Developer (Client side Lead)
positions.description: Leading the client side development for research and government on-line software. main focus is on visual data and representation of textual data in visuals and maps.

positions.title: Senior Interactive Developer
positions.description: Leading the Interactive Development Production as an Interactive Developer. With a main focus on Video Broadcasting, interactive touch displays and online campaigns. Creating content for: Tribal DDB, Philips, Neutrogena, Clean & Clear, Cuervo and other applications that where nominated in numerous awards.

Vijay is a talented hard working developer that strives to create better architectures.  While managing a development of a large framework on a team of 12+ developers, Vijay stood out as a valuable core developer, being a team player with a fundamental hunger to create better applications. While the project was moving very quickly, he stood out by working hard into the night to understand the underlying foundations of the project. With his hard work and dedication (and his great personality) he had a great impact on the project and I would gladly be a referral to him on any future endeavor he has.  

I look foreword to working with him again in the future.
